fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Annihilate a player, erasing their existence from the game. Players eliminated by you are permanently removed and cannot be revived or interacted with in any way.
- Once per game, you may summon the "Spectral Vortex" during the day, causing chaos and confusion among the town. This ability prevents any investigations, protection roles, or special abilities from working for that day and night cycle.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You possess an ethereal form, rendering you immune to any form of harm, control, or manipulation. You cannot be killed, converted, or affected by any negative effects.
- Your mere presence instills fear in others, granting you immunity to all forms of voting, lynching, or execution.
- If a town role possesses any form of resistance, defense, or protection, their abilities are rendered useless against you. You bypass all defenses and immunities.
- Your existence distorts reality, preventing the game from ending as long as you are alive and at least one town role with defense is present.
- Instantly gets deleted if visited by <@504813861950586891>, ignoring all attributes.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Immerse the town in a state of eternal darkness by annihilating all town roles with defense and achieving absolute dominance over the realm.
